Headline: Temporary Reroute
ShortDescription: #71 buses are rerouted in both directions via Torrance, 100th, and Commercial.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?
Buses are rerouted in both directions via Torrance, 100th, and Commercial. 

Allow extra travel time.

Why is service being changed?
Buses are rerouted due to utility maintenance at Commercial/103rd.

Headline: #4 Cottage Grove Temporary Northbound Reroute near Cottage Grove/South Chicago
ShortDescription: NB 4 Cottage Grove buses are temp. rerouted via Cottage Grove, South Chicago, Rhodes, 67th and Cottage Grove: near Cottage Grove/South Chicago.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #4 Cottage Grove buses are temporarily rerouted via Cottage Grove, South Chicago, Rhodes, 67th and Cottage Grove: due to, street blockage near Cottage Grove/South Chicago.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
